PublicComplaint.name: PublicComplaint
PublicComplaint.description: Represents the complaints submitted by public users. This object is available in API version 49.0 and later.

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with this complaint.

CauseSubtype.description: The subtype of complaint cause. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

CauseType.description: The type of complaint cause. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

Comments.description: Additional details about the complaint. This field is available in API version 51.0 and later.

CompensationAmount.description: Any amount of money offered to resolve the complaint. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ComplaintCaseId.description: This field is deprecated as of API version 49.0.

ComplaintCaseStatus.description: The status of the related Case. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ComplaintSummary.description: A summary of the complaint information.

EscalationCause.description: The reason the complaint was escalated. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

IsComplainantAuthorized.description: Whether the person who filed the complaint is an authorized representative of the Account. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date that a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date that a user viewed this record.

ProductType.description: The product that the complaint is about. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ReceivedDate.description: The date the complaint was received. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ReporterAddress.description: Address of the reporter for further communication.

ReporterCategory.description: Role of the reporter in the organization.

ReporterOrganization.description: Organization that the reporter is part of.

ResolutionPriority.description: Indicates the priority for complaint resolution.

ShouldInclInRegulatoryRpt.description: Whether this complaint must be included in a regulatory report. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

SourceType.description: The source of the complaint. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

Subject.description: Subject of the complaint. This field is available in API version 51.0 and later.
